verses.verse: כָּרַ֥ע <S%H3766><s%> boweth down בֵּל֙ <S%H1078><s%> Bel קֹרֵ֣ס <S%H7164><s%> stoopeth נְב֔וֹ <S%H5015><s%> Nebo הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6091><s%> their idols לַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> were upon the beasts וְלַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and upon the cattle נְשֻׂאֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5385><s%> your carriages עֲמוּס֔וֹת <S%H6006><s%> [were] heavy loaden מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> [they are] a burden לַעֲיֵפָֽה׃ <S%H5889><s%> to the weary

קָרְס֤וּ <S%H7164><s%> They stoop כָֽרְעוּ֙ <S%H3766><s%> they bow down יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> they could מַלֵּ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> not deliver מַשָּׂ֑א <S%H4853><s%> the burden וְנַפְשָׁ֖ם <S%H5315><s%> but themselves בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity הָלָֽכָה׃ <S%H1980><s%> are gone ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto me O house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> and all the remnant בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַֽעֲמֻסִים֙ <S%H6006><s%> which are borne מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from בֶ֔טֶן <S%H990><s%> [by me] from the belly הַנְּשֻׂאִ֖ים <S%H5375><s%> which are carried מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from רָֽחַם׃ <S%H7356><s%> from the womb

וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and even זִקְנָה֙ <S%H2209><s%> And [even] to [your] old age אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> will be the same וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and even שֵיבָ֖ה <S%H7872><s%> I [am] he and [even] to hoar hairs אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֶסְבֹּ֑ל <S%H5445><s%> will I carry אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6213><s%> [you] I have made וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֶשָּׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> and I will bear וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אֶסְבֹּ֖ל <S%H5445><s%> even I will carry וַאֲמַלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> and will deliver ס

לְמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> to whom תְדַמְי֖וּנִי <S%H1819><s%> To whom will ye liken וְתַשְׁו֑וּ <S%H7737><s%> me and make [me] equal וְתַמְשִׁל֖וּנִי <S%H4911><s%> and compare וְנִדְמֶֽה׃ <S%H1819><s%> me that we may be like

הַזָּלִ֤ים <S%H2107><s%> They lavish זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> gold מִכִּ֔יס <S%H3599><s%> out of the bag וְכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver בַּקָּנֶ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> in the balance יִשְׁקֹ֑לוּ <S%H8254><s%> and weigh יִשְׂכְּר֤וּ <S%H7936><s%> [and] hire צוֹרֵף֙ <S%H6884><s%> a goldsmith וְיַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <S%H6213><s%> and he maketh אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> it a god יִסְגְּד֖וּ <S%H5456><s%> they fall down אַף־ <S%H637><s%> indeed יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> yea they worship

יִ֠שָּׂאֻהוּ <S%H5375><s%> They bear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כָּתֵ֨ף <S%H3802><s%> him upon the shoulder יִסְבְּלֻ֜הוּ <S%H5445><s%> they carry וְיַנִּיחֻ֤הוּ <S%H3240><s%> him and set him in his place תַחְתָּיו֙ <S%H8478><s%> place וְיַֽעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> and he standeth מִמְּקוֹמ֖וֹ <S%H4725><s%> from his place לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָמִ֑ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> shall he not remove אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Though יִצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> yea [one] shall cry אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעֲנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> unto him yet can he not answer מִצָּרָת֖וֹ <S%H6869><s%> him out of his trouble לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יוֹשִׁיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3467><s%> nor save ס

זִכְרוּ־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> yourselves וְהִתְאֹשָׁ֑שׁוּ <S%H377><s%> this and shew yourselves men הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> bring [it] again פוֹשְׁעִ֖ים <S%H6586><s%> O ye transgressors עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> to mind

זִכְר֥וּ <S%H2142><s%> Remember רִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <S%H7223><s%> the former things מֵעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> of old כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I אֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> for I [am] God וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> other אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and [there is] none else [I am] God וְאֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> and [there is] none כָּמֽוֹנִי׃ <S%H3644><s%> like

מַגִּ֤יד <S%H5046><s%> Declaring מֵֽרֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> from the beginning אַחֲרִ֔ית <S%H319><s%> the end וּמִקֶּ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> and from ancient times אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> [the things] that are not [yet] done אֹמֵר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying עֲצָתִ֣י <S%H6098><s%> My counsel תָק֔וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall stand וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶפְצִ֖י <S%H2656><s%> all my pleasure אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> and I will do

קֹרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> Calling מִמִּזְרָח֙ <S%H4217><s%> from the east עַ֔יִט <S%H5861><s%> a ravenous bird מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country מֶרְחָ֖ק <S%H4801><s%> from a far אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man [עֲצָתֹו כ] (עֲצָתִ֑י <S%H6098><s%> advice ק) אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Truly דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H1696><s%> yea I have spoken אַף־ <S%H637><s%> truly אֲבִיאֶ֔נָּה <S%H935><s%> [it] I will also bring יָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H3335><s%> it to pass I have purposed אַף־ <S%H637><s%> truly אֶעֱשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> [it] I will also do ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אַבִּ֣ירֵי <S%H47><s%> strong לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> care for הָרְחוֹקִ֖ים <S%H7350><s%> that [are] far from מִצְּדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> righteousness

קֵרַ֤בְתִּי <S%H7126><s%> I bring near צִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> my righteousness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> is not תִרְחָ֔ק <S%H7368><s%> it shall not be far off וּתְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <S%H8668><s%> and my salvation לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not תְאַחֵ֑ר <S%H309><s%> shall not tarry וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will place בְצִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> in Zion תְּשׁוּעָ֔ה <S%H8668><s%> salvation לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel תִּפְאַרְתִּֽי׃ <S%H8597><s%> my glory ס
